items.title: Garbage collectors are turning Africa’s largest slum into one of the world’s most bitcoin-friendly places
items.description: Bitcoin came to Soweto West via AfriBit Africa, a Kenyan fintech company, through its nonprofit initiative to improve financial inclusion.

items.title: U.K. remains Europe’s top spot for finance investment, EY says
items.description: Global investors also see London as the most attractive European city for financial services foreign investment over the coming year, according to EY.
